dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3746 IH: Rebuilding America’s Airport Infrastructure Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Amodei of Nevada introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to make modifications to the passenger facility charge program administered by the Federal Aviation Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rebuilding America’s Airport Infrastructure Act.

subsection.text: Section 40117 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1) by striking of $1, $2, $3, $4, or $4.50 and inserting described in paragraph (4);
by striking paragraph (4) and inserting the following:

paragraph.text: The maximum amount of a passenger facility charge imposed under paragraph (1) shall be—

subparagraph.text: for a 1-year period beginning on January 1, 2027, $5.50;
for a 1-year period beginning on January 1, 2028, $6.50;
for a 1-year period beginning on January 1, 2029, $7.50; and
on and after January 1, 2030, $8.50 (adjusted annually for inflation).

clause.text: by striking paragraphs (1) and (4) and inserting paragraph (1); and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2)(C) by striking the semicolon and inserting ; and;
in paragraph (3) by striking ; and and inserting a period; and

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to passenger facility charges imposed on or after January 1, 2027.
